topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55715c4563687274446b4100#post_55715c4563687274446b4100
What's sad is that Duke Nukem Forever was such a terrible game that it's essentially permanently killed the franchise.  They wasted tens of thousands of dollars on stupid things like making the pinball machines work when they could have put that programmer to making the game actually decent.

Imagine if the put a someone that was actually competent in charge of the game?

topics.body:
"World's first lab grown limb":http://www.sciencealert.com/scientists-produce-the-first-lab-grown-limb

This is massive step in medicine; imagine being able to grow arms or legs for amputees?

(If you're wondering why I'm using sciencealert  news site so much lately it's because linking to the actual research paperwork costs money and I don't think people here are willing to shell out $15 to read a unabridged research document)
